channel.title: New Cache on Bluurs Client
channel.description:
Hey Respected Client Guru's out there, I've recently thought about if i can use a newer cache on Bluurs #317 Client and figured out if i do i can edit the game alot. But i've wanted to make sure i can accaully make sure what i want will happen.
1) Will I get the updated Maps [E.G. Warriors Guild Upstairs] 2) New NPCs? :D 3) Possibly HD [If i use 508 HD, 525 or 562?]
And is it as simple as changing your cache lols. anyways i hope someone can answer me.

item.title: New Cache on Bluurs Client
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Hey Respected Client Guru’s out there,
I’ve recently thought about if i can use a newer cache on Bluurs #317 Client and figured out if i do i can edit the game alot. But i’ve wanted to make sure i can accaully make sure what i want will happen.

  2. New NPCs?
